title: Shares of several financial services companies are trading higher following strong US jobs data and continued optimism amid the reopening of the economy.

UPDATE: Morgan Stanley Upgrades Ally Financial to Overweight, Announces $26 Price Target As Firm Notes 'A recovering economy should lift Ally's fundamentals with more jobs, more driving, and more auto sales,' Cites 3 Reasons Why:
Ally Financial shares are trading higher Morgan Stanley upgraded the stock from Equal-Weight to Overweight and announced a price target of$26 per share.
Morgan Stanley Upgrades Ally Financial to Overweight, Announces $26 Price Target

Shares of several financial services companies are trading higher amid economic optimism, stemming from some US states reopening businesses, an increase in mortgage demand figures and positive vaccine sentiment.
